title: Virtual Learning Object Design for Nursing History Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of nursing and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning (10 live sessions + 9 asynchronous activities) conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Explain the influence of major events and figures in nursing history using ADDIE model-based virtual learning objects.
Produce project outcomes related to nursing history using online collaboration tools.
Enhance the ability to analyze the social context of nursing development through asynchronous learning activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
